snippet: As part of a sustained assault on the extremist group known as al-Qaida in the Arabian Peninsula, U.S. warplanes have launched more than 30 airstrikes in Yemen the past two days, a Pentagon spokesman said Friday....

headline.main: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband
headline.print_headline: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband

lead_paragraph: As part of a sustained assault on the extremist group known as al-Qaida in the Arabian Peninsula, U.S. warplanes have launched more than 30 airstrikes in Yemen the past two days, a Pentagon spokesman said Friday.
